name: SOKOBOT Demo
description:
SOKOBOT is an open-ended puzzle game where you place down cute robots, give them commands, and create infinitely-looping assembly lines that combine shapes together!

This is just a demo version. Here's a calendar of events if you want to be up to speed:

  • Feb 9th: Demo goes live on Steam
  • Feb 21st-28th: Demo is part of Steam Next Fest
  • March 4th: itch.io and Steam Release

That's a lot of Steam news for itch.io but just trying to be transparent.
